attributes.action: Offer incentives  to all churches and mosques  to share their facilities
attributes.additional_details:
In  some parts of the country rural  churches and chapels  are having to close  for a variety of reasons.

Please  encourage and offer incentives   to all religions for them to share  their premises  and land  with each other  for the benefit of community relations.

There should be no  objection  and no dissent  for mosques, for example,  to be built   on spare ground   on Church of England  sites.
